1370: Clarebout was born in Tuytsteeg in 1370.
1375: Lost mother at the age of 5 in childbirth.
Lost mother at the age of 5.
Wolbrand took care of Clarebout since Clarebout was 6.
1377: Lost father at the age of 7.
Left Tuytsteeg.A.3 for lack of a breadwinner.
Went to live in the orphanage at age 8.
1387: Clarebout moved to Die Coninc straet.B.5 in 1387.
Left orphanage at the age of 18.
1388: Lost sibling Lieuin in 1388 when Lieuin was 14.
1391: Got married to Ghoudekinen at age 22 in 1391.
Had Ghoudekinen move in at Die Coninc straet.B.5 after marriage.
1393: Had a daughter with Ghoudekinen, Ghoudekinen, at age 23.
1395: Lost daughter Ghoudekinen when Ghoudekinen was 3 years old.
1398: Had a son with Ghoudekinen, Eremboldus, at age 28.
